featured.text: Pumping this super-salty water back into the ocean can harm local aquatic life.

definition.zh_def: 泵是一種機械裝置，用於移動液體或氣體，通常通過產生壓力來實現。
definition.en_def: A pump is a mechanical device used to move liquids or gases, typically by creating pressure.
definition.example: The gardener used a pump to water the plants efficiently.
